```vue
<template>
    <ui-container>
        <div>verticalAlign: {{ verticalAlign }}</div>
        <div>horizontalAlign: {{ horizontalAlign }}</div>
        <ui-radio-buttons v-model="verticalAlign" col-size="3-12" v-bind="verticalBinds" />
        <ui-radio-buttons v-model="horizontalAlign" col-size="3-12" v-bind="horizontalBinds" />
    </ui-container>
</template>
<script>
import ui from './index.js';
import { VerticalAlignOptions, HorizontalAlignOptions } from '@goodt-wcore/panels';

export default {
    components: { ...ui },
    data: () => ({
        verticalAlign: '',
        horizontalAlign: '',
        verticalBinds: {
            options: VerticalAlignOptions
        },
        horizontalBinds: {
            options: HorizontalAlignOptions
        }
    })
};
</script>
```
